{"id":839317419,"question_id":724,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1667899691,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/839317419/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"52.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        \n        int sum=0;\n        for(int n: nums){\n            sum+=n;\n        }\n        \n        int curr=0;\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.length; i++){\n            if(curr*2==sum-nums[i])\n                return i;\n            curr+=nums[i];\n        }\n        \n        return -1;\n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
